full_summary:
**Title:** General Cleaning Technician Courses - Tender Announcement
**Reference:** cb-188-22852623
**Publication Date:** July 4, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** July 19, 2024, 2:00 PM EDT

**Summary:**
This is an advance contract award notice (ACAN) announcing the procurement of General Cleaning Technician Courses for federally incarcerated offenders. The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) requires a supplier to provide vocational training that meets community standards and labor market conditions.

**Scope of Work:**
The selected supplier will provide third-party certification training related to general cleaning, including best practices and commercial cleaning industry standards. The training will be delivered via a self-study training kit handed out to inmates/learners. The supplier must provide all necessary materials for each training session, submit a list of successful and unsuccessful participants, and deliver recognized certificates to successful candidates within the specified timelines.

**Security Requirements:**
The contractor must hold a valid Designated Organization Screening (DOS) and obtain approved Document Safeguarding Capability at the level of PROTECTED B. Contractor personnel requiring access to PROTECTED information, assets, or sensitive sites must be citizens or permanent residents of Canada or citizens of the United States of America and hold a valid RELIABILITY STATUS.

**Evaluation Criteria:**
 Suppliers will be evaluated based on their experience in providing cleaning training, program requirements, and ability to meet the advertised criteria. The supplier must have at least four (4) years of experience within the last ten (10) years in providing cleaning training. The program curriculum must include the following: Cleaning to Perfection – General Cleaning and Training Program.

**Statement of Capabilities:**
Suppliers interested in bidding on this project must submit a statement of capabilities by July 19, 2024, 2:00 PM EDT. The statement must clearly demonstrate how the supplier meets the advertised requirements.

**Contact Information:**
For inquiries and statements of capabilities, please contact Aimée Legault, Senior Contracting Officer, at aimee.legault@csc-scc.gc.ca.

**Attachments:**
The tender document is available for download from the Canada Buys website.
